Rectangle

public Rectangle(java.lang.String spec)
Construct from a resource geometry specification string.
    supported formats
  • width x height + x + y (e.g. 100x300+50+50 or 100x300-20+20)
  • width x height (e.g. 100x300)
  • + x + y (+50+50 or -20-20)
